trait.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The octon can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

trait.name: Combat Ready
entries: The octon has advantage on initiative checks.

trait.name: Disintegration
entries: If the octon dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The octon makes three Tentacle attacks.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage.

action.name: Whirlwind of Tentacles {@recharge 5}
entries: The octon rapidly extends and spins its ring of tentacles. Each creature within 20 feet of the octon must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet in a straight line toward the octon. Then, the octon makes two Tentacle attacks against each creature within 10 feet of itself.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The octon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):
